Texts.Eng:
A history as a prey-animal has led these now highly evolved rodents to become protectors of the weak and downtrodden.

Diet: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
+^green;30^reset;% Ice, Poison and Cosmic Resist
^green;-25^reset;% Hunger Rate
Immune: Poison, Bee Stings
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
1h combos increase protection
Rapier/Shortsword/Mace: +^green;10^reset;% Damage, +^green;0.25^reset;% Crit Chance
Rapier/Dagger: +^green;25^reset;% Protection
 
^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
 -^red;30^reset;% Electric, Shadow, Radiation Resistance
